choices: A human boy
A human consuler fellow
A non anthro animal stalking the  campers
A large hungry fat fur guy
More furry Selections
1.content:
The old camp has seen hard times, but for the city youth its a taste of the wild. It has been cheap to go to for as long as anyone can remember, missing children happen often, But its often hushed up. The weather is fine, the sun is high in the air and you look upon the camp ground, day 1 has come, busses deliver the kids, Parents come in cars to deliver some more, Consolers are already here, And the others watch from sheltered places.. planning



*note* Though the choices to start are all male at any point (within reason) people can branch of into a similar character with the oppoite gender(So a woman consuler branch off is perfectly fine
1.title: Who are you

choices: Your first time away from Ma and dad..
Your a boyscout(18), this is going to be a bore
Its another camp.. go get your uniform
Scout around the place, see where everything is
Take a swim in the lake
11.content:
Staring out at the camp before you your impressed, the place is huge, somewhat run down but who are you to really be able to tell that, to a kid rough edges make it all the more fun. You run to the middle of the camp, touch the main totem pole then decide what to do next




*when your eaten please leave at LEAST one path to take on the life of another boy. No connection need to the demise of the firsts
11.title: A human boy... what to do

choices: Your a chubby boy- maybe you can lose a bit of weight
stick thin but athletic, you'll rise to the top
111.content:
The camp before you looks enough like the brochure, four hours of riding in your families mini van would make any stretch of the legs seem like heaven. You wished your mom and dad good by, gave them a kiss and took your time walking around the grounds.

Soon the loudspeakers echo to the whole camp "Would all the new campers please go to the lodge cabin for orientation. "

Well that seems simple enough, looking around you notice one building where other kids like you seem to be gravitating toward. Looking yourself over you notice, compared to most of the others your....
111.title: Fresh Scouting.. Your on your own

choices: things go as planned, your assaigned a cabin with 19 others.
Odd.. your consuler is wearing a racoonyish suit and is BIG
1111.content:
142 lb 4 foot 5 and getting winded walking to the fridge for some hershies kisses.. thats you in a nutshell... you have worn adult clothing from time to time because yours doesn't fit so well. Your pale skin dribbles with sweat even as you walk. A lard ass.. but that let you fall on people who harrased you.. sometimes... So sumo you follow up near the end of the new campers. Entering the biggest cabin in the camp, orientation you assume
When you enter you take a seat.. and wait....
1111.title: Chubby boy

choices: Go to orientation and give the kids the rules of camp
Check around the grounds for miscrients
Go check on a few of the other consulers
you got a large furry freind who'd like a meal...
You actually plan to feed the kids to non anthro animals
12.content:
You've been spending your summers at camps around the area for years now, picking up some cash and mooching on free food. They tend to pay poorly but it gets you out in the open, allows you to experiance alot of fun things.. now if there weren't so many kids screaming

Oh well, Its time to take a look at what you plan to do today
12.title: Human Consuler

choices: did he say preds?
121.content: "Okay, rule #1, don't win against the preds; rule #2, Worship the preds, Rule #3, Have fun!
121.title: Go to orientation and give the kids the rules o...

choices: A 14 foot VERY fat Wolfcoon
A 11 Foot Racoon called Bulwark
a 10 foot lardo gator wearing suspenders..
5 foot lion boy scout
8 foot tall hir otter
14.content:
They don't really make pants for your girth, you do your best with what you can find but a fat fur is what a fat fur does. Food is on the mind always, be that food hamburgers or humans.

Right now you stand on a small hillock, overlooking the camp, it looks so picturesque, it could be a wonderful place to spend the next two weeks...

But what kinda lardy are you? that is the question
14.title: Fat Fur on the PROWL

choices: Go and "rescue" another drowning camper
143.content:
The lawn chair creaks loudly and sags as you set your large girth down on it with your scaly tail poking out the back of the chair. You pick up a pair of black sunglasses in your clawed hands and set it on top of your snout. Then you turn your attention back to the campers swimming in the lake.

You still can't believe that you were actually hired for this job. After all, who would hire an Alligator to be a lifeguard? You've already eat... er, rescued three drowning campers today.

"BELCH!" Your squirming belly trembles before you scratch your crotch obscenely.
143.title: Alligator Lifeguard

choices: The kids get away, the whole lakeful screaming..damn..
You manage to catch one..by the ankle
1431.content:
Licking your chops, stroking your belly, you decided that your a couple kids low on a full tank, your eyes watch the lake with predatory intent. You see a couple out in the deep water, playing"Shark" with eachother.. just the couple you could use...
You dive into the water with a modest splash and go underwater.. invisible to all you move deeper, following the smell of your free, swimming slowly, Holding your breath is no trouble

By the time your at them the waters so murky they can't even see you approach, you grab the closest swim trunks, preparing to pull him under and in, he slips out of them, lands a stunning kick on your snoth and knocks you senseless for a few crucial moments.
1431.title: Life saving-Klutz

choices: Eat another One- The taste is well worth the risk
Return to your Post- You could catch one later, when things settle down
14312.content:
You regain your senses almost in an instant, and wrap your jaws around the boys ankle before he could get away. With one jerk of your neck, he is sent completely underwater, and you open your jaws again and wrap them around his lower torso. With another jerk of your neck, the only thing still emerging from your maw was his head and arms- and with another jerk, not even that.

You swallowed the boy that was squirming in your mouth, sending him into your throat, a quick series of repeated swallows sending him deeper into your gullet. You smirked as the boy finally fell into your stomach, his fate sealed- the only testament to his existence being the torn pair of swim short floating in the pool.

Attracted by the screams, the scouts were gathering around the swim shorts, panicked. You looked at the immense group of unwary kids above you, and you wondered whether you should grab another one, or return to your post during the panick.
14312.title: You manage to catch one..by the ankle

choices: Help make camp.
The leader has a badge challange for you.
144.content:
With a little purr of a yawn you lift your arms and stretch atop the rock. As you lean back your round belly lifts slightly, only to sag down over your shorts. You are a ten year old lion whom is visiting the camp with your scout troop. Your body is covered in a golden fur besides a creamy beige just over your tummy. Of course it is a bit distorted by the size of your stomach. To a human you would seem tall for your age, coming in at about five feet, but your species tends to reach over fifteen feet in adulthood. So in truth your actually kind of short. Like all the members of your group you wear a green vest with an attached sash, showing off your badges, and a pair of brown cargo shorts. The shorts are rather tight around your sizable bottom, and you've had a few problems with them splitting in the past. While your troop will be staying near the camp you are not actually visiting it. Rather you will working on your wilderness survival skills. The main skill, of course, being the finding of food. The official visiters to the camp are there to "help" you in this persuit.

As you look down at the camp a soft breeze wraps around your fur. You have not begun to grow a mane yet but it still causes your fur to ruffle. Your focus is broken as a voice rises behind you. It is the leader of your troop. He is a tall and slim weasal, and his species describes his voice well, but is actually a very trustworthy individual. Looking down at the campers scurrying about he smiles. "Don't worry, we can pick up some lunch later. For now we need to work on setting camp." You nod as the two of you head back to the clearing in which you set your tents and backpacks.
144.title: The great outdoors

choices: Boyscouts...
CubScouts
145.content:
Well.. who'd have thunk it.. you'd finally got a job.. shows you how progressive the city has become, your huge, your both genders, and your covered with fur, and yet you were able to get this job watching over scouts..

The fact that you applied online, and they neglected a species section, and sorta lied by saying you were a female(Your uniform covers up the manly parts really... thought your not happy about wearing a skirt.. you'll solve that.
(EDIT, more later)

As you lurk around the grounds you eventually decided to go foward and introduce yourself as a new counsler, and helper for this ______ troup
145.title: An otter with a job

choices: A young chubby otter boy, here by mistake.. hungry boy
A Muscular Hyena Consuler
A muscle fat Ursine, badly wearing the garb of his last meal
(adding in later)
(adding in later)
15.content:
You sport fur, and your at camp, Being the only fur bearing creature with intelligence in miles you feel more than a bit out of place. You scratch behind your ear a bit and look over the other people,..

So why are you here? Who are you



*Note,path ones otter is pred only.
15.title: More furry

choices: You're an alpha wolf, but you are fairly philosofical
You're a lion, and all male, baby!
Other?
154.content:
Well, you aren't really known that well by the campers...in fact, no-one knows you at all, save a select few: the head-cheif of the camp, and a few of the more "accepting" campers. Oh, sure, you've been spotted by other people before -it's nearly impossible to stay out of sight in a park area this well frequented- but the sightings were always chalked up to "dumb animals being frightened off by the scary humans". Well, that's what the park ranger always says it is; thank the higher power, whom ever it may be, that humans can't go through the woods and properly operate a camera.

Anyhoo, the campers who do know of you are under the impression that you're a "residential spirit" who lives in the woods and only appears in front of those who give it a good impression. That is only a partial truth; you aren't a residential spirit of any kind...at least, you don't think you are. You've been living here for a good while, and despite human arrogance, the head-cheif recognizes that you are best left un-hurt, in every sense of the word. That would be why he built a camp in such a place; plenty of humans, plenty of chances to teach aforementioned humans, and most importantly of all (to him at least), the most chances to punish people without being caught; that's where you come in. As long as you've lived in the woods -which is, again, a good long while- you've had the urge to completely devour those who've done you wrong, be it a falling leaf, or a cheeky, ignoramus of a camper who thinks that with just a small pea-shooter and a backpack he can go out into the woods and make it on his own (you'd be surprised by how many fall under that assumption). Course, those pea-shooters have gotten more powerful lately, and they do hurt for a while if the ignoramus is lucky (they almost never are, though).

In anycase, as said above, you've been living at the camp for a while -the head-cheif was a teenager when you first met him, now he's a grown middle-aged man- but you don't seem to age nearly as fast as those around you, nor are you all that concerned with creating future generations. That's not to say you don't like sex, you just don't really feel like going out and finding a female to breed with.

What species are you anyhow?
154.title: A "residential spirit" in the woods

choices: continue
1542.content: You are a lion, and high on hormones
1542.title: You're a lion, and all male, baby!

info.brief_description: A story focusing on the tragic end of a summer camp in a national park.
info.description:
A story focusing on the tragic end of a summer camp in a national park. Be a camper that is doomed to end poorly, be an animal hunting down tasty campers,. be a fur doing much the same, there are plenty of places to explore in the camp, ideas to flesh out and expand on. A few places here

The camp has a big lake
The camp has a massive forest that merges into a even more varied national park, filled with caves and hunters of various types.. maybe escapes
Each of the longhouses for campers sleeps 40, perhaps there are secret passages...


NOTHING naughty to the underage characters/kids.there are plenty of counslers, parents and park visitors for that
info.pretty_title: The Last Days of the Summer Camp
